pageContext.claim: “I can tell you they [Google, Facebook and Amazon] discriminate against me. You know, people talk about collusion. The real conclusion is between the Democrats and these companies. Because they were so against me during my election run.”
pageContext.analysis: There's no evidence that the media or the social media companies did anything to thwart Trump's chances at being elected. Some have even suggested that CNN's coverage played a role in helping Trump get elected.
